import React from 'react'; import { AutoLinkHeader, Example, Link as PatternflyThemeLink } from 'theme-patternfly-org/components'; import srcImportcollapsed from './html-demos/collapsed.png'; import srcImportexpandedattention from './html-demos/expanded-attention.png'; import srcImportexpandedbasics from './html-demos/expanded-basics.png'; import srcImportexpandedgroups from './html-demos/expanded-groups.png'; import srcImportexpandedread from './html-demos/expanded-read.png'; import srcImportexpandedunread from './html-demos/expanded-unread.png'; import srcImportexpandedwithgroups from './html-demos/expanded-with-groups.png'; const pageData = { "id": "Notification drawer", "section": "components", "source": "html-demos", "slug": "/components/notification-drawer/html-demos", "sourceLink": "https://github.com/patternfly/patternfly/blob/main/packages/docs/src/patternfly/demos/NotificationDrawer/examples/NotificationDrawer.md", "fullscreenExamples": [ "Collapsed", "Expanded read", "Expanded unread", "Expanded attention", "Expanded with groups" ] }; pageData.examples = { 'Collapsed': props => Skip to content
